remarks: A coefficient of the polynomial over matrices which is the result of the transformation of a polynomial matrix is the matrix consisting of the coefficients in the polynomial entries of the polynomial matrix. (Contributed by AV, 20-Oct-2019.)  (Revised by AV, 5-Dec-2019.)
statement:
pm2mpval.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
pm2mpval.c $e |- C = ( N Mat P ) $.
pm2mpval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
pm2mpval.m $e |- .* = ( .s ` Q ) $.
pm2mpval.e $e |- .^ = ( .g ` ( mulGrp ` Q ) ) $.
pm2mpval.x $e |- X = ( var1 ` A ) $.
pm2mpval.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
pm2mpval.q $e |- Q = ( Poly1 ` A ) $.
pm2mpval.t $e |- T = ( N pMatToMatPoly R ) $.
pm2mpcoe1 $p |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( M e. B /\ K e. NN0 ) ) -> ( ( coe1 ` ( T ` M ) ) ` K ) = ( M decompPMat K ) ) $.
